div.p: OUGHT TO DO IT, MR. LESLEY.

p.span: TO BOLDLY GO WHERE NO MAN
OF THE GALAXY AND FAR BEYOND.

div.p: THAT'S HOW I CAME TO BE

p.span: WHICH SEEMS TO BE THE SOURCE

div.p: AND I TREATED A DEEP ABRASION

p.span: NOT ONLY HAVE TWO OF MY

div.p: SO HE CAN ESCAPE FROM ME.
IF I TOLD YOU THE TRUTH.
